title: Studio in Westlake South +Covered Parking +Outdoor BBQ +Pet-Friendly
posting_body: ['Welcome to HOMEY: ONE, a 31 unit hotel-like residence adjacent to downtown LA.', 'Inspired urban living.', 'Outdoor common space designed for entertaining/working/lounging.', 'Community dining for gatherings.', 'A designated workspace for makers to launch their next product or explore their next hobby.', 'Huge L-shaped Studios are laid out like 1BR units with a separate sleeping area.', 'Flexible lease terms of one year or 6 months.', 'Because as much as HOMEY was created to inspire you while you live here, we also want to inspire you to move on when ready.', '\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200bHOMEY is where next-gen creative professionals live, gather, and create.', 'Covered parking included.', 'show contact info', '<URL>/', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', '- Dishwasher', '- Refrigerator', '- Gas Range', '- Hardwood Flooring', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES', '- Controlled Access', '- Laundry On-Site', '- Outdoor Lounge', '- Outdoor BBQ', '- Non-Smoking Community', '- Dog Run', '- Covered Parking', 'PET POLICY', 'Cats and Dogs Welcome.', 'Additional Fees and Deposit May Apply.', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', '1029 South Union Avenue', 'Los Angeles, CA', '90015', 'Square Footage Is Approximate.', 'Price and availability are subject to change.', 'Interior photos may not be of exact unit.', "Close to Flavors of Thai, Yardhouse, Monty's Good Burger, LA Live, Whole Foods, Vons, Food 4 Less, Downtown Los Angeles, Westlake, South Park, Fashion District, Koreatown, University Park, Southwestern Law School, FIDM, Golden Gate University, 110, 10, 101, 5 Freeway"]
